name: electricity, high voltage, import from IN-Eastern grid | electricity, high voltage | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/16330/documentation

This dataset represents the amount of imported electricity from Indian Southern grid to Indian North-eastern grid. The import value is valid for 2012 and includes all electricity imports, independently whether used within the importing country, or re-exported. For a discussion of different ways of modeling electricity trade in LCI, please refer to the following literature:;;Itten, R., Frischknecht, R., and Stucki, M. (2014) Life Cycle Inventories of Electricity Mixes and Grid. treeze Ltd., Uster, Switzerland.

This activity represents the point of 'handing over' the electricity from one region to the other at the border.

This dataset doesn't include any electricity losses or transmission infrastructure as these are accounted for in the market datasets.
category: D:Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply/35:Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply/351:Electric power generation, transmission and distribution/3510:Electric power generation, transmission and distribution

processDocumentation.timeDescription: Annual production volume is valid for 2012-13
